faq.heading: Frequently Asked
faq.subheading: Got questions? We've got answers. Here are the most common questions about NeChaos.

items.question: How does the AI assistant understand my scheduling preferences?
items.answer: Our AI learns from your past scheduling patterns, meeting preferences, and feedback to make increasingly accurate suggestions. It considers factors like your preferred meeting times, buffer periods, and work-life balance preferences.

items.question: Can I change the AI personality after setting it up?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can switch between different AI personalities anytime in your settings. Each personality maintains the same scheduling intelligence but communicates in their unique style.

items.question: How does timezone handling work for international teams?
items.answer: NeChaos automatically detects and converts time zones for all participants. It shows meeting times in everyone's local timezone and prevents scheduling conflicts due to timezone confusion.

items.question: What calendars can I integrate with NeChaos?
items.answer: Integrations are coming soon. We plan to support Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar, and most CalDAV-compatible calendar services.

items.question: Is my calendar data secure and private?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your personal data. NeChaos keeps your data safe and only uses local processing for AI when possible.
